column1: #Text=Hey , how is that cheering me up ?
#Text=" Katara says : " These acorns are everywhere , Aang .
#Text=That means the forest will grow back !
#Text=Every one of these will be a tall oak tree someday , and all the birds and animals that lived here will come back .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , who are you ?
#Text=" Kay - fon says : " When I saw the flying bison , I thought it was impossible !
#Text=But , those markings ... are you the Avatar , child ?
